pages.text: Some say that the $(bold)Void$() is the ultimate holder of truth, as all things of the universe are from the void, from this utter emptiness. This dimension is more of a dream than reality, for one cannot truly enter into nothingness. Even just the imaginings of the mind, mixed with the power of the $(Bold)Void$(), can be incredibly powerful. Be wary, for sorry will try to drag one down into its

utmost depths. But this dimension of reality, though not the exact manifestation of the void, is the truest in a perceivable sense. Within this dimension, there are hidden wonders beneath the darkness that encapsulates the surface.

If one were to dig down, there is a special ore called $(bold)$(6)Arcamirus Ore$(), arcamirus meaning mysterious and wonderful. The reason it is called such is  because it is exactly that. No one really knows what it is or what creates it.

Some say that it is the souls of the ancient alchemists who have been absorbed into the universe, the $(bold)Void$() itself. Others say it is fragments of power that the void holds being condensed into rock. No theory has any basis, just assumptions. The second part of the defenition of $(d)arcamirus$() is wonderous, of which is defined by what this dust can accomplish. If a bag of such dust is used on $(d)gold ore$(), it will create a material slightly more powerful

than zorumite called $(bold)$(6)Strange Zorumite$(), it is slightly more powerful than diamond as well. $(d)Strange Zorumite$() can be used to make the same weapons as $(d)Zorumite$(), with enhanced abilities.
Can be used on $(d)gold ore$(), as well as potentially other blocks, which can be found by using the $(d)Speculo Inanis$().
